flow.descriptionCdata:
aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.0315263c-2350-4d9e-991d-15db1b502467.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.16ffe90d-f09b-441d-ad5c-2bf99251c395.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.18742990-3e68-4883-a544-711a80d0ced4.prompt=Component ID aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.339dffd8-0001-4991-946c-21c9c26d544e.prompt=User Identifier aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.342676d8-5d1c-4ef6-a642-35ab6b716086.prompt=User Identifier aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.3cf4951c-7fdd-43ae-82a3-5ac5122fc60e.prompt=Resource Provider ID aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.55ecc433-fcee-4b5d-8936-7dc55f83aa25.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.7340c60f-c92f-449d-a9a6-101f20a8f47b.prompt=User Identifier aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.85ea9f82-e226-4cf3-9b80-318f2a2d8f0d.prompt=User Identifier aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.874eb278-0f55-48e4-a403-b21a2bf72f85.prompt=User Identifier aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.93545fc4-9330-49c6-ab10-a2771289cb3f.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.9bcde4d5-6132-4f11-a606-452d6a7c233d.prompt=Component ID aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.a38cf53f-87d2-4b94-b5d2-8ba962617d49.prompt=Component ID aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.c020ec36-6083-42e8-809e-35e4a5fdeac8.prompt=Process Instance ID aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.d168be3f-17da-4185-af3a-9c4bcf96b50b.prompt=User Identifier aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.d8ed5118-eeab-45e2-81af-2e8e261c1e99.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.da4ff4c6-55eb-4bd8-a4d5-68d41ee34bd5.prompt=Process Instance ID aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.dd5e0c4d-b9d2-4e1f-a9e2-3daeceab981c.prompt=User Identifier aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.description=
Provision a  Simple Vcenter Linux VM from a VM template. 

Inputs Parameters\:

 CSA_CONTEXT_ID – CSA Context Id
 CSA_PROCESS_ID – CSA Process Instance Id
 SVC_COMPONENT_ID - This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
 RSC_PROVIDER_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL - This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
 RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
  		Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE - This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
 RSC_POOL_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
 SVC_INSTANCE_ID - This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 PRN_COMPONENT_ID – This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
 REQ_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
 REQ_USER_ID - This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
 USR_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
 RSC_BINDING_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

Responses\:
 success - The operation completed successfully.
 failure - Something went wrong.
aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.df175a5c-cd9a-4413-834e-7f8bf2349fd1.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.e42c96ba-de3e-4c49-b7ec-68cb6e30de56.prompt=Process Instance ID aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.e6b968fd-9dbd-4cb8-b546-0ffb1804ede8.prompt=User Identifier aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.f4328433-d24b-47af-a5a0-70246af16a3f.prompt=Artifact ID aa784300-910b-4294-ae2f-46e003c5126b.fe0733c3-a163-4e1c-bc72-8e75941274dc.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz
flow.name: Docker PostgreSQL Deploy
